name: Midnight Legends
storyline:
Hop in and participate in frantic combat racing on the mean streets of Midnight City, a place lit by bright neon lights. Earn money and reputation, upgrade your car, win to challenge all “legendary racers” of the city, and make your way to becoming a Midnight Legend.

Immerse yourself in a world filled with adrenaline racing and neon light, the future metropolis in the story-driven arcade racing Midnight Legends! A game in which you can challenge the best street racers and show real driving skills.

- Win breathtaking races through the streets of the Midnight City.
- Avoid the cops!
- Buy and upgrade amazing cars of the future.
- Try to defeat the City Legends and become the most famous racer in the history of Midnight Legends.
summary: Hop in and participate in frantic combat racing on the mean streets of Midnight City, a place lit by bright neon lights. Earn money and reputation, upgrade your car, win to challenge all “legendary racers” of the city, and make your way to becoming a Midnight Legend.
